messages.message: Do not define components during render. React will see a new component type on every render and destroy the entire subtree’s DOM nodes and state (https://reactjs.org/docs/reconciliation.html#elements-of-different-types). Instead, move this component definition out of the parent component “MainTabNavigator” and pass data as props. If you want to allow component creation in props, set allowAsProps option to true.

Do not define components during render. Instead, move this component definition out of the parent component “MainTabNavigator” and pass data as props. If you want to allow component creation in props, set allowAsProps option to true.

Do not define components during render. React will see a new component type on every render and destroy the entire subtree’s DOM nodes and state (https://reactjs.org/docs/reconciliation.html#elements-of-different-types). Instead, move this component definition out of the parent component “MainTabNavigator” and pass data as props. If you want to allow component creation in props, set allowAsProps option to true.
'photoURL' is assigned a value but never used.
